about_the_game:
Unleash your creativity and outwit your friends in Write Warz, the award-winning party game that turns storytelling into a battle. Whether you’re in it to crush the competition, have a laugh with friends, or just break through your writer's block you can craft hilarious, wild, or epic stories with up to 6 players, or go solo in our all-new single-player mode. Write, vote, and unleash powerful character abilities to take control of the story! Every round is a new adventure, where strategy meets creativity. What’s your story?


Each round starts with a writing phase. A starting sentence sets the scene, and your task is to write the next sentence of the story. You have a limited time to unleash your creativity and add your twist to the unfolding narrative.




Your voice matters in Write Warz. Players cast votes to determine the best contributions, steering the story's direction. With every vote, the plot thickens, characters evolve, and the tale takes unexpected turns, keeping everyone on the edge of their seats.





Plot Point Events are dynamic in-game occurrences that significantly alter the course of the storytelling experience. These events introduce unexpected twists and challenges that players must navigate, adding layers of complexity and excitement to each game. Each Plot Point Event is thematically tied to the overarching narrative of the game and is designed to test the players adaptability, creativity, and strategic thinking. They serve as crucial junctures in the story, where the tale can take a dramatic new direction.


Step into the eerie and unknown with the Horror theme, where every word you write could summon a nightmare or uncover a dark secret. In this chilling realm, players craft spine-tingling tales of suspense, navigating supernatural forces and unsettling twists at every turn. Each sentence you pen might reveal a hidden clue, invoke an ancient curse, or unleash unspeakable horrors. As the line between reality and terror blurs, your choices shape the unfolding story, deciding whether you survive the night or fall victim to the lurking darkness. In Write Warz, every word counts, and in the Horror theme, even your creativity isn’t safe from the shadows.


Set sail for high-stakes adventure on the open seas with the Pirate Adventure theme in Write Warz! Navigate treacherous waters, buy and sell supplies at various ports, and keep your crew fed and content—or risk facing a mutiny! With every round, your choices matter as you raid rival ships, discover hidden treasures, and fend off enemies in naval battles. Watch out for random events and all-new pirate-themed plot points that can change the tides of the game in an instant. Will you hoist the sails in pursuit of fortune, fame, or something more? And yes—there are sing-alongs! In this wild, seafaring tale, only the boldest pirates will rule the waves.


Dive into a realm where ancient traditions clash with mystical forces in the Elves vs. Samurai theme. In this epic anime-themed saga, players choose between the graceful elves and the honorable samurai, engaging in a war that spans worlds. Gather resources, forge alliances, and engage in epic battles while chronicling the saga of your chosen faction. As the war unfolds, the lines between friend and foe blur, and the fate of both civilizations hangs in the balance. Will your tales inspire victory or serve as a cautionary tale of hubris and downfall? Coming season 1!

From a horror writer to a member of the legendary Van Helsing family – there are plenty of hand-drawn characters to choose from. Every character was carefully crafted in-house by our talented artists!

In Write Warz, each character has unique abilities that can shift the game's momentum in unexpected ways. These abilities unleash powerful effects that can impact the entire table, giving players an edge or creating challenges for their opponents.

Abilities might help players gain extra votes, steal points, alter writing conditions, or impose penalties on rivals. Mastering these abilities is crucial to outsmarting the competition, as well-timed abilities can turn a losing streak into a victory or disrupt your rivals’ best-laid plans. Whether you're defending yourself from attacks, stealing key bonuses, or manipulating the narrative, these abilities provide strategic depth and exciting twists to every game.

Write Warz is a live-service, free-to-play game—the first of its kind in the competitive storytelling genre. With its unique blend of strategy, creativity, and party game fun, Write Warz offers endless possibilities for adventure and imagination. Whether you’re outwitting friends, crafting epic tales, or breaking through writer’s block, each session brings something new. Regular updates introduce fresh themes, characters, and challenges to keep the storytelling dynamic and ever-evolving.

What story will you write today?

Discord Community

name: Write Warz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2.66 Ghz Core 2 Duo or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600+ / Radeon 6000+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
  • VR Support: no
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Quad Core or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600+ / Radeon 6000+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
  • VR Support: no

short_description: Embark on epic storytelling adventures with Write Warz, a 6-player creative sandbox where your imagination drives the action! Craft sentences, vote on plot twists and shape your own legendary tales with custom characters and unique abilities in diverse themed worlds. Ready to create your epic story?
